text: The Bulgaria women's national under-20 volleyball team represents Bulgaria in international women's volleyball competitions and friendly matches under the age 20 and it is ruled by the Bulgarian Volleyball Federation That is an affiliate of Federation of International Volleyball FIVB and also a part of European Volleyball Confederation CEV. ==Results== ===FIVB U20 World Championship=== Champions Runners up Third place Fourth place {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|FIVB U20 World Championship Championship Information |- !Year !Round !Position !
